narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Jacquenlyn Amerson is a Counselor, Professional provider based in Fresno, TX. From 2021-07 through 2023-08, this provider received $347K in Medicaid payments across 4K claims serving 751 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 97% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 90837 (90837). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Saw a 3.2× spike in 2022 ($62K → $197K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
Billing stopped in 2023-08, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
